testCases.label: Verify AppComponent initialization
testCases.description: Ensures that the AppComponent is successfully created within the Angular TestBed environment.

testCases.label: Verify AppComponent title value
testCases.description: Checks that the AppComponent initializes its title property to the string 'routing', supporting routing-based lab exercises.

testCases.methodName: should navigate to profile route and render ProfileComponent

testCases.description: Simulates navigation to the 'profile' route and verifies that the ProfileComponent is successfully rendered in the DOM.
